Articles.Content: Hype intensifies.

"There are currently 3161 users online. 604 members and 2557 guests

Most users ever online was 4,329, 17th December 2014 at 01:33."

This is the issue. Need moar people online!

> 
> Ask myself why won't Harvester just put 1.0 up for download
> 
> Ain't nobody have no answers...
> 
> **AND SO I PULL OUT MY GUN**

WOA! I thought we had to check our weapons to get onto the Hype Train? They took my machete...

> 
> Is this thread even about KSP anymore? It seems to be about creating as many garbage posts as possible as quickly as possible.
> Which I'm totally okay with.
> 
> Choo choo!

This thread is about creating as many garbage posts as possible for the greater glory of 1.0
the hype is slowing down! HYPE UP, ENGAGE ALL THRUSTERS
